name: In re Jeannine BAFUNNO. Appeal of Rodney DEFRAIN

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: In re Jeannine BAFUNNO. Appeal of Rodney DEFRAIN.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Decree of the Court of Common Pleas of Columbia County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Donald Driscoll, Susquehanna Legal Services, Richard Sandow, Bloomsburg, for appellant.
Franklin E. Kepner, Jr., Berwick, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
425 A.2d 747
In re Jeannine BAFUNNO. Appeal of Rodney DEFRAIN.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 22, 1981.
Decided Feb. 27, 1981.
Donald Driscoll, Susquehanna Legal Services, Richard Sandow, Bloomsburg, for appellant.
Franklin E. Kepner, Jr., Berwick, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
